page.title: 15WOOD OFFICE,TEMPLETON.
page.content: Wood Office Caravan Site is in the village of Cold Blow.There are approx 36 caravans in the whole site.They have fully equipped kitchens.Mrs. Morris's caravans sleep six.Fitted kitchens provide china and cutlery plus a fire extinguisher, curtains and one blind.They also have a wardrobe with coathangers.The caravan site is set in park land with tranquil surroundings.There is no noise of traffic.There is a shop that supplies sweets,milk,cigarettes,groceries and drinks.There are ladies and gents toilets,spindryer and showers for 10p. Rent is inclusive of eletricity.There are chemical toilets in the Tourers. The two cesspits are cleaned every 12 months.The Tourist Board checks the caravan site.Calor gas is supplied.The site is floodlit at night.Most caravans are privately owned.
